channel.title: Escape V2 [Customs] [Ice items!] [Dicing] [Pking][Active ECO][Penguins][VPS]Join
channel.description:
Hello all, im here today to advertise a really good server, Escape V2.
It has all types of customs you could ask for, including, L33T partyhat, Duck Wings, Brutal Whips, Lite wepons, Ice Armour, Ice whips, Net values on yell.
It has a thriving economy with lots to offer, with a player base of 15-30 it is a very good server with a active owner who helps, and a VPS.
We are on a stable connection so DC's are rare, the Pking is awesome and it never goes dead, come and give it a try!
We also have frequent giveaways and events, such as Hide and Seek and tournaments, with good prices.
Images:
*NOTE* there is alot of media in this link as it is like a collage of photos.
[url=http://imgur.com/a/g4yy6]Escape V2 - Tizenx Remake - Imgur[/url]
Download link:
[url=http://up.ht/1iIzcMd]Download Escape.jar @ UppIT[/url]
Come and join today, everyone is welcome, Enjoy!
